description: DEFENCE CONSTRUCTION CANADA (DCC) – PA616451_79075 – Inspection, Testing and Maintenance of Central Heating Plant Boilers – Petawawa, Ontario
full_summary:
### Invitation to Tender

**Project Title:** Inspection, Testing and Maintenance of Central Heating Plant Boilers - Petawawa

**Project Ref**: MX-22658148310

**Solicitation Number**: PA616451-79075

**Tender Closing Date:** February 28, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

**Procurement Category:** Construction Contract

**Notice Type:** Invitation to Tender

**Project Description:**

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is issuing an open invitation to tender for the Inspect, Test, and Maintain (ITM) Central Heating Plant Boilers, located in Petawawa, Ontario. The work includes, but is not limited to:

* Supply of labor, materials, supervision and equipment necessary for ITM and Minor Repair of three (3) boilers
* Services to be performed according to equipment manufacturer manuals and referenced standards

**Security Requirements:**

The successful bidder must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) issued by the Canadian Industrial Security Directorate (CISD) of Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC).

**Bidding Procedure:**

Bidders are required to order tender documents from MERX either online or by calling (800) 964-MERX (6379). Bidders must be on the official list of those who have ordered the tender documents, otherwise their bids may be declared invalid.

**Site Visit:**

A site visit has been arranged for January 25, 2023, at 10:00 AM EST at DCC Office, Building S652, Petawawa. Bidders are highly recommended to attend.

**Estimated Cost:**

The estimated cost for this project is in the range of $2,000,000

**Terms and Conditions:**

* The work must be completed within 1825 calendar days after notification of contract award.
* The preliminary tender results for this project will be available on MERX.
* Any inquiries must be directed to the Designated Contract Authority, Stephen Recoskie at (613) 312-0224 or PCO@dcc-cdc.gc.ca.

**Contract Award Results:**

Contract award results will be available on the DCC website at [Contract Activity - Defence Construction Canada (dcc-cdc.gc.ca)](https://www.dcc-cdc.gc.ca)
